Vendor library overrides are placed here, such as dropkick or tablesaw.

Different formats:

1) As a SCSS Partial. eg. _dropkickjs.scss - If you know that this code will be utilized on most of the site.

2) As a standalone CSS file. eg. tablesaw.stackonly.scss - If you know that the code int his file will only be used on one or two files that you can import in via a module or process snippet in the template for certain nodes or blocks.
